details: Added Copilot prompt blocks and inline prompts via new Liquid tag and code header enhancements.
Introduced "multi-part secrets" section for secret scanning, including validation for key IDs and pair matching.
Updated GHES 3.19 general availability date in enterprise-dates.json.
Added "projects" to managed search indices for GHES versions > 3.17.
Added `unist-util-find` dependency to support Copilot features.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added Copilot prompt blocks and inline prompts via new Liquid tag and code header enhancements.
- Introduced "multi-part secrets" section for secret scanning, including validation for key IDs and pair matching.
- Updated GHES 3.19 general availability date in enterprise-dates.json.
- Added "projects" to managed search indices for GHES versions > 3.17.
- Added `unist-util-find` dependency to support Copilot features.

### Title
Add Copilot prompts, multi-part secrets, and update GHES features
